content:
Get in touch: hello@thermalintegrity.com.au
Felix Andrews has worked as a NatHERS Thermal Performance Assessor, modelling and evaluating hundreds of house designs. He is also a Residential Efficiency Scorecard Assessor for existing homes. He has a background in software development, data visualisation, scientific modelling, and teaching.
title: Contact

content:
Thermal Integrity works to reduce energy waste in houses. Based in Canberra, Australia.
We can help with modelling and assessment of new builds, or existing houses.
Posts coming soon about our building design philosophy, and an existing house upgrade journey.
summary: Thermal Integrity works to reduce energy waste in houses.
title: Thermal Integrity
